ECDS_Description: Require complete supervision. All patients must be signed off by a senior before admission or discharge.
Require access to advice or direct supervision, or practice independently but with limited scope
Notes: ENPs, ANPs / ACPs, PAs, ESPs, F2 doctors, CT1-2 doctors, some primary care clinicians

ECDS_Description: More senior / experienced clinicians, requiring less direct supervision. Fewer limitations in scope of practice
Notes: CT3 in EM, junior Speciality Doctors, some ANPs / ACPs and PAs, some primary care clinicians

ECDS_Description: Senior clinicians able to supervise an Emergency Department alone with remote support. Possess some extended skills. Possess some extended skills. Full scope of practice.
Notes: CT4 and above, senior Speciality Doctors

ECDS_Description: Senior clinicians with accredited advanced qualifications in EM. Full set of extended skills. Full scope of practice.
